name: Pure Media
description:
Pure Media is a full-service media communications agency with experience across a wide range of media disciplines.
Their core offering is to plan and buy across all traditional, online and emerging media for consumer, B2B & B2C campaigns in the UK, across Europe and Internationally.
They pride themselves on providing outstanding service, tailoring their approach to each of its client's individual briefs and business needs and achieving the highest standard of work.
